meanings.definition: A substance that provides nourishment essential for growth and the maintenance of life.
meanings.sent1: Fruits and vegetables are rich in nutrients.
meanings.sent2: Our bodies need nutrients like vitamins and minerals to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The plants in the garden were gossiping about which nutrient was the most popular.
meanings.sent4: Love is the nutrient that feeds the soul.
meanings.sent5: Imagine your body as a garden, with nutrients as the seeds that help it grow and thrive.

meanings.definition: A component of food that supports bodily functions.
meanings.sent1: Proteins and carbohydrates are important nutrients for our bodies.
meanings.sent2: Nutrients like fiber help with digestion and overall health.
meanings.sent3: The nutrient party in my stomach was a hit with all the vitamins and minerals dancing together.
meanings.sent4: Laughter is the nutrient that keeps our spirits light and happy.
meanings.sent5: Picture your body as a machine, with nutrients as the fuel that keeps it running smoothly.
